abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins captain Sidney Crosby is still recovering from a January concussion, spurring new discussions in hockey about head trauma; his earliest conceivable return to play is mid-October, but will likely be later.
snippet: Pittsburgh star Sidney Crosby, still recovering from a January concussion, has prompted discussion in the N.H.L. about head trauma in hockey.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh star Sidney Crosby, still recovering from a January concussion, has prompted discussion in the N.H.L. about head trauma in hockey.

headline.main: Though Not Ready to Play, Crosby Shapes the Game
headline.print_headline: Though Not Ready To Play, Crosby Shapes the Game
headline.seo: A Changed N.H.L. Guards Against Shots to the Head
